description: Detects a "winlogon.exe" process that initiate network communications with public IP addresses
author: Christopher Peacock @securepeacock
SCYTHE @scythe_io
false_positives: Communication to other corporate systems that use IP addresses from public address spaces
name: Outbound Network Connection To Public IP Via Winlogon
query: ((process.executable.text:"*\\winlogon.exe" AND winlog.event_data.Initiated:"true") AND (NOT destination.ip:(10.* OR 127.* OR 172.16.* OR 172.17.* OR 172.18.* OR 172.19.* OR 172.20.* OR 172.21.* OR 172.22.* OR 172.23.* OR 172.24.* OR 172.25.* OR 172.26.* OR 172.27.* OR 172.28.* OR 172.29.* OR 172.30.* OR 172.31.* OR 192.168.*)))
